summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no information available about Kathryn Dyer. The documents primarily discuss CIA issues related to the JFK assassination records and decisions made during an ARRB meeting on November 17, 1997. These issues include the release of CIA records, the status of the Warrenton Records Center, CIA's use of State Cover, Nosenko NBR records, Cuban Revolutionary Council financial records, the Ramparts Damage Assessment Document, Book Cables Dissemination Lists, and Document #104-10072-10232. Kathryn Dyer is not mentioned in any of the summaries.
significance: Based on the provided documents, the significance of Kathryn Dyer in the JFK context is unknown.
